Title: S7 Ep. 291 Justin Spears - Embrace the power of innovation because generative AI is out of the box.
Description:
I met Justin Spears at I/ITSEC event in 2023 at the M3D Technologies booth. Justin is the fractional Chief Growth Officer for M3C and he is also the founder of his own consulting firm, MXI Consulting. He served in the Navy for 5 years as an Aerospace Medicine Supervisor. He has a passion for entrepreneurship and spent his college years studying that very topic.  One of the quotes that he shared is “Are you revolutionary or evolutionary?  Wondering what that means? Be sure to listen to how Justin differentiates these two terms. Other areas we covered is how to be a holistic entrepreneur with a realistic expectation of personal professional time management and balance.  

 

Moving to the Future of Work in 2030, Justin shared that no one should be replaced by AI and if you want to know more we invite you to tune in and leave us a comment sharing what you liked about the show, difference of opinions, or recommendations for other guests.

We hope you enjoy this week's episode of The Intern Whisperer.
